岳陽.definition: see 岳陽市|岳阳市[Yue4yang2 Shi4]

岳陽市.definition: Yueyang, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

岳陽樓.definition: Yueyang Tower, famous beauty spot in Yueyang, north Hunan, overlooking Dongting Lake 洞庭湖[Dong4 ting2 Hu2]; one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yellow Crane Tower 黃鶴樓|黄鹤楼[Huang2 he4 Lou2] in Wuhan, Hubei and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi

岳陽樓區.definition: Yueyang Tower district of Yueyang city 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan

岳陽樓記.definition: On Yueyang Tower (1046), essay by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4yan1]

岳陽縣.definition: Yueyang county in Yueyang 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan

岳飛.definition: Yue Fei (1103-1142), Song dynasty patriot and general

岳麓山.definition: Mt Yuelu in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], famous for scenery, temples and tombs
